data.title: Nia Long Archives
data.text:
Nia Long Will Get $32,500 A Month In Child Support Following Custody Settlement Nia Long has to be happy with her custody settlement. Long and her ex, Ime Udoka, have finally settled their custody battle, and the actress will get $32,500 a month in child support. The former couple will share joint custody of their […]

After reporting Nia Long and Taraji P. Henson "were at war with each other" on the set of Empire, TMZ caught up with Nia and asked about the alleged beef.

Nia Long has kept a pretty low-pro since rumors began to spread that the actress has been having issues getting along with the cast and crew of Empire, especially the show’s star, Taraji P. Henson. But judging by her Instagram, it appears that Miss Long may be sending a subliminal message about the diva rumors. […]

Nia Long’s work ethic reputation seems to be on the line due to the complaints of the Empire cast and crew. Long was a recurring guest in season three of the show, which has just wrapped. She played an ex-lover to Lucious Lyon, who was in the process of reconnecting with Cookie. Well it seems we shouldn’t […]

Nia Long was such a nightmare on the set of “Empire” the hair and makeup people made an official complaint against her, and Nia also threatened to sue the show over an improper goodbye. They say Nia was disrespectful and unprofessional throughout her run on the show. Nia and Taraji P. Henson were at war with each […]

If you’ve ever heard the song ‘Wind Beneath My Wings” (Gerald Levert and his father, Eddie, remade it some years back) you may have wondered where it came from. Well, for those of you born after 1990, you might not know that it’s the theme song from the 1988 movie Beaches starring Bette Midler and […]

Nia long is joining the cast of Empire this season. Word on the Curb Long’s character will be going head to head with Cookie. Long is a veteran actress she’s appeared on films such as Boyz n the Hood, Friday, The Best Man, and Netflix’s Dear White People. Naomi Campbell, Vivica A. Fox, Taye Diggs, and other […]

This is Nia Long as you’ve never seen her before…going up against the Lyons! The latest season of the FOX hit series Empire is already off to a great start, as the storyline for the current third season is filled with the twists, turns and drama that we have come to love and expect […]

The latest season of the FOX hit series Empire is already off to a great start, as the storyline for the current third season is filled with the twists, turns and drama that we have come to love and expect from the show. Additionally, the guest stars for this season have been top-notch as well, […]

Nia Long is the prime example of how to bounce back when you are faced with a setback. After her summer series Uncle Buck, co-starring Mike Epps, was swiftly cancelled after only airing a handful of episodes, she has been adding to her resume constantly. Aside from the Lifetime network remake of Beaches which also […]

Usually the news of movie remakes is met with a “meh” response or an eye roll at the very least, but an upcoming remake of a very popular film may change all of that. It has just been announced that the ever-beautiful Nia Long has joined the cast of Lifetime network’s Beaches remake, taking on […]
